document_data.mainbody: The '''Sword Trail''' was a traveling route that spanned a stretch of the northern coast of the [[Moonsea (lake)|Moonsea lake]] in [[north Faer√ªn]].{{Cite dungeon/177/Realmslore: Vaasa|81}}
document_data.Description: Unlike the adjacent [[Phlan Path]], this road was like many trails in the region in that it was fairly under-developed as of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Geography: The trail originated in the city-state of [[Melvaunt]] and followed the coast southeast, passing over the [[River Thent]] until it reached the independent city of [[Thentia]].
